review: We have been consulting Dr. Sangitha frequently at Chandanagar Apollo clinic, and found her very compassionate and kind.
**** **** ******* listen the problems patiently and explained the solution.  Explained the clear scenarios to my mother about precautions and measures.

*** ** **** ** *********
i had pink eye - red eye - she asked to do CBP - platelet count on first day its not related
other instance i had no fever only cold and cough - was asked same platelet count CBP - come on cant do this to people as common people can not afford this

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
